Posts.Content: Dec 30, 2017 07:37PM Quiltingnut wrote: Please try not to be afraid. I had my biopsy two days ago and I felt no pain. Hardly even felt the first little sting from the numbing medication. I was scared also and was pleasantly surprised.You will do fine. Sorry you are having to go through this.
